original: Borgquist, Sture Lennart, rådman, Linköping, f. 20/8/02 i Kristianstad av förvalt. J. B. o. Fredrika Holm. G. 40 m. Signe Örn. — Stud:ex. i Landskrona 21, jur. kand. i Lund 28. Tings-tjg. i Linköp. 28-31, bitr. jurist å adv:-byrå 31, tf. rådm. i Linköp. 32, brott-målsrådm. där sed. 38, auditör v. Livgren :reg. o. Svea trängkår sed. 46.
translated: Borgquist, Sture Lennart, councilman, Linköping, b. 20/8/1902 in Kristianstad, son of administrative officer J.B. and Fredrika Holm. Married in 1940 to Signe Örn. - Received diploma from Landskrona 1921, law degree from Lund University 1928. Worked as a court clerk in Linköping from 1928 to 1931, assistant lawyer at a law firm in 1931, and temporary councilman in Linköping in 1932. Became a criminal councilman there in 1938, and served as an auditor with the Livgren regiment and Svea supply corps from 1946.
